T02D3645:257b-1: n'a ge shva r'a r'a dza s'a dha nam /
T02D3645:257b-3: klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3645:257b-4: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3645:257b-5: thog mar gnas khang nyams dga' bar kha gdong dag par byas nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3645:257b-6: 'byung po thams cad tshim par byed pa'i sngags /
T02D3645:257b-7: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'at aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3645:257b-8: zhes brjod la aom a'a:bighn'anta kri ta h'um phat ces
T02D3645:257b-9: brjod pas phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o
T02D3645:257b-13: btang snyoms sngon du song bas nam mkha'i mtha' dang
T02D3645:257b-14: mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs
T02D3645:257b-15: rgyas thob par 'dod pa'i blos rang gi snying gar
T02D3645:257b-16: h'um bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu las 'phros pa'i 'od
T02D3645:257b-17: kyis lus khyab nas rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3645:257b-18: klu dbang rgyal por gyur par bsams /
T02D3645:257b-19: de nas snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas mdun
T02D3645:257b-20: gyi nam mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang
T02D3645:257b-21: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D3645:257b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po gtso 'khor
T02D3645:257b-23: lnga pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la
T02D3645:257b-24: / phyag 'tshal ba sngon du songs bas dngos su bshams pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02D3645:257b-26: mchod pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D3645:258a-1: badzra phushpe a'a:h'um zhes brjod pas me tog thogs pa'i lha mo sngon mos nam mkha' khengs pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-2: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a:h'um zhes brjod pas bdug spos
T02D3645:258a-3: thogs pa'i lha mo ser mo dpag tu med pa
T02D3645:258a-4: dang / aom badzra d'i pe a'a:h'um zhes brjod pas
T02D3645:258a-5: mar me thogs pa'i lha mo dmar mos nam mkha'
T02D3645:258a-6: dang / khengs pa dang / aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um
T02D3645:258a-7: zhes brjod pas dri mchog thogs pa'i lha mo ser
T02D3645:258a-8: mo dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-9: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a:h'um zhes brjod pas zhal
T02D3645:258a-10: zas thogs pa'i lha mo ser skya ma dpag tu
T02D3645:258a-12: aom sarba bi sho dha p'u dza me gha spha
T02D3645:258a-13: ra na sa mu dre a'a:h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod
T02D3645:258a-14: la / de nyid la rin po che sna tshogs dang /
T02D3645:258a-19: bla re la sogs pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-20: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3645:258a-21: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-22: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3645:258a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02D3645:258a-24: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-25: dge ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
T02D3645:258a-26: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3645:258a-28: de nas ye shes kyi tshogs bskyed par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D3645:258a-29: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:svabh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod pas /
T02D3645:258a-30: chos thams cad spros pa dang bral bar bsams /
T02D3645:258a-31: de nas stong pa nyid la gnas pas sems can
T02D3645:258a-32: gyi don mi 'grub pas snying rje chen po'i rang
T02D3645:258a-33: bzhin gyi pam las padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan
T02D3645:258a-34: pa yangs shing rgya che bar bsam /
T02D3645:258a-35: de'i steng du chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med
T02D3645:258a-36: par ston par byed ba'i yi ge aa dkar po
T02D3645:258a-37: 'od du zhu ba las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs
T02D3645:258a-39: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mi dpogs rin po
T02D3645:258a-40: che'i mdog lta bu las 'od zer 'phros pas klu
T02D3645:258a-41: rnams dang sems can gyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i
T02D3645:258a-42: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dag nas h'um
T02D3645:258a-43: skad cig ma gcig la klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i
T02D3645:258a-45: de yang sku mdog mi dpog rin po che'i mdog
T02D3645:258a-46: lta bu sbrul mgo bdun gdengs pa'i rgyab yol can
T02D3645:258a-47: / chos gos ngur smrig gsol pa dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa /
T02D3645:258a-48: klu thams cad klu'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa dang /
T02D3645:258b-0: sems can thams cad @258b ngan 'gro'i skye gnas las thar par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D3645:258b-1: bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan par bsam /
T02D3645:258b-2: de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog dkar po /
T02D3645:258b-3: rin po che'i myu gyu phyag g-yas na bsnams pa /
T02D3645:258b-4: g-yon na bum pa bsnams pa /
T02D3645:258b-5: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D3645:258b-7: g-yas su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sku mdog
T02D3645:258b-8: dmar po klu shing gi go lcog me tog dang
T02D3645:258b-9: bcas pa dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D3645:258b-10: rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur
T02D3645:258b-11: gyur pa sku mdog gser btso ma'i kha dog lta
T02D3645:258b-13: g-yon du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po padma bsnams pa /
T02D3645:258b-15: g-yas phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D3645:258b-16: g-yon phyogs su dgra bcom pa dpag tu med pa bsam mo //
T02D3645:258b-17: 'og gi phyogs su klu'i tshogs dpag tu med pa
T02D3645:258b-18: rin po che thogs pa thal mo sbyar ba gyen
T02D3645:258b-20: / de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la mchod pa dang /
T02D3645:258b-21: gsol ba legs par btab la /
T02D3645:258b-22: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhis spyan drangs la /
T02D3645:258b-24: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D3645:258b-25: dgyes par byas la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D3645:258b-27: aom ta th'a ga to bha ga b'an n'a ga
T02D3645:258b-28: r'a je shva ra aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te
T02D3645:258b-29: sv'a h'a / 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas mdze nad thams cad dang /
T02D3645:258b-30: myong bar nges pa'i las thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D3645:258b-31: bum pa gnyis las gcig tu bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs dang /
T02D3645:258b-33: 'bru sna tshogs kyis dgang bar bya'o //
T02D3645:258b-34: gcig tu klu nor rgyas kyi bu la klu chen
T02D3645:258b-35: po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i gzugs bcug la rin po
T02D3645:258b-38: 'bru sna tshogs kyis legs par bkad la /
T02D3645:258b-39: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi khar
T02D3645:258b-40: bum pa gnyis po bzhag la ba dmar mo gnyis
T02D3645:258b-43: tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D3645:258b-44: aa ka ru nag po'i bdug spos dang /
T02D3645:259a-3: rol mo sna tshogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-4: thun mong gi nor rdzas la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02D3645:259a-5: zhag bdun du snying po rgyun ma chad par bzlas
T02D3645:259a-6: na dbul ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro
T02D3645:259a-9: lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3645:259a-10: bum pa gnyis po yang 'og tu klu'i bum pa
T02D3645:259a-11: bzhag / steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi bum pa
T02D3645:259a-12: bzhag nas gnas khang gi shar phyogs su gter du
T02D3645:259a-13: sbas na phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur
T02D3645:259a-14: ro // klu'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3645:259a-16: bud med thams cad dar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3645:259a-17: char dbab pa ni bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs su bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-18: char bcad pa ni bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i me tog la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-19: sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D3645:259a-20: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rmi lam zhu bar bya'o
T02D3645:259a-21: // gtor ma gsum byas la gcig ni bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-22: gnyis pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la'o //
T02D3645:259a-23: gsum pa ni klu rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-24: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D3645:259a-25: de nas gshegs su gsol la /
T02D3645:259a-26: thun mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3645:259a-27: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i dbang phyug
T02D3645:259a-28: rgyal po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod par
T02D3645:259a-29: bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3645:259a-30: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3645:259a-32: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
